In 1869, just five years after John Newlands put forward his law of octaves, a 
Russian chemist called Dmitri Mendeleev published a periodic table. Mendeleev

search_results.title: BBC - GCSE Bitesize: Mendeleev's periodic table

question: In 1869 this Russian chemist predicted the properties of 3 undiscovered elements based on his periodic law
